Description.Name: Aircademy VTOL Appointment
Description.Details: Tired of feeling grounded as everything else flies past you? Well then, Air Today, Gone Tomorrow has the perfect solution for you: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVTOL],VTOL]] Flight Training. An appointment to Air Today, Gone Tomorrow's Aircademy Flight School will reward you with the knowledge of the skills needed to pilot a VTOL. This training course, supplemented by neurostimuli and training simulators, can be yours for no more than ¢500,000. Your tuition fee covers all costs associated with your training including room and board for 6-12 months. Stop letting your worms eye veiw affect your performance on the battlefield! WARNING! Tuition costs ¢500,000 and the Commander will not be available for 6-12 months. Applicant must have prior vehicle experience. Our reps are not responsible if you do not have the funds to pay the tuition. Avoid buying until you have a proper bankroll. VTOL Training is dangerous. Accidents do happen and Air Today, Gone Tomorrow's Aircademy Flight School will not be held responsible for any injuries sustained during training.
